system.description:
A small, scarab-shaped amulet with the power to instil a blood rage in those who see it.

  • Charges: [[/r 1d6+18]] charges.

  • Command word: The owner must present the scarab and utter a command word to activate its magic.

  • When activated: Intelligent enemies within 40’ are stricken with blood rage (save versus spells to avoid).

  • Blood rage: Affected creatures immediately attack the closest creature, whether it is friend or foe. If the creature is killed, the stricken creature attacks the next nearest. The rage causes a +1 bonus to attack rolls, a +2 bonus to damage rolls, and a –3 AC penalty.

  • Duration: [[/r 1d6+6]] rounds.
